table_description: Contains comprehensive employee information including personal details, employment status, position, department assignment, and manager relationships from 2018 to 2023.
use_cases: Search employees by name, department, or position
data_quality_notes: employment_status is TEXT type with CHECK constraint - use exact matches: 'Active', 'Inactive', 'On Leave', 'Terminated'
manager_id is self-referencing (employees.employee_id) - can be NULL for top-level managers/department heads
Sample data contains 15 employees with various statuses and hire dates
Cities include Jakarta, Surabaya, and Bandung
For current employees, always filter employment_status = 'Active'

table_columns.name: employee_id
table_columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each employee.

table_columns.name: email
table_columns.description: Employee's email address. Unique constraint applied. Format: firstname.lastname@company.com

table_columns.name: phone
table_columns.description: Employee's phone number. Format: Indonesian mobile numbers starting with 0812.

table_columns.name: hire_date
table_columns.description: Date when employee was hired. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Use for tenure calculations.

table_columns.name: position_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to job_positions table. References the employee's current job position.

table_columns.name: department_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to departments table. References the department where employee works.

table_columns.name: manager_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to employees table (self-referencing). References the employee's direct manager. NULL for top-level managers and department heads.

table_columns.name: employment_status
table_columns.description: Current employment status. Allowed values: 'Active', 'Inactive', 'On Leave', 'Terminated'. Use exact string matches in queries.

table_columns.name: birth_date
table_columns.description: Employee's date of birth. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Use for age calculations.

table_columns.name: address
table_columns.description: Employee's street address in Indonesia (e.g., 'Jl. Sudirman No. 123').

table_columns.name: country
table_columns.description: Country where employee resides. All sample data shows 'Indonesia'.
